resumeItems: Led the design and implementation of a high-performance serverless architecture for multi-region deployment, reducing latency by \textbf{30\%} and improving user engagement by \textbf{25\%}.

Enhanced security compliance by automating access policies and deploying infrastructure monitoring with AWS CloudTrail and GuardDuty, resulting in a \textbf{70\%} reduction in security incident response time.
Built a customer analytics dashboard using Amazon QuickSight and Redshift, enabling real-time insights that improved customer satisfaction scores by \textbf{15\%}.
Developed and optimized firmware for in-vehicle infotainment systems, improving media response time by \textbf{40\%} and minimizing system crashes.
Designed and tested secure Over-the-Air (OTA) update functionality, increasing update reliability by \textbf{85\%} and reducing downtime during software patches.
Collaborated closely with the QA team to establish a dynamic test suite for embedded systems, accelerating test coverage by \textbf{30\%} and reducing regression issues.
Engineered a recommendation system using collaborative filtering and neural networks, increasing monthly user retention by \textbf{20\%}.
Implemented A/B testing frameworks that enabled rapid experimentation across recommendation models, reducing testing time by \textbf{50\%}.
Optimized data pipelines for real-time processing of 1M+ audio streams daily using Apache Kafka and Spark, enhancing processing speed by \textbf{60\%}.
Expert in cloud infrastructure and containerization, with strong proficiency in AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Exceptional analytical and troubleshooting abilities, adept at diagnosing complex issues in distributed systems.
Effective communicator with experience in cross-functional collaboration and stakeholder management.
\textbf{Languages}: Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, Go, SQL, TypeScript.
\textbf{Frameworks and Libraries}: Django, Flask, React, Node.js, TensorFlow, PyTorch.
\textbf{Tools and Platforms}: AWS, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Terraform.
\textbf{Techniques}: Machine Learning, Data Engineering, Cloud Architecture, Distributed Systems, Microservices.
Developed a traffic monitoring system using computer vision algorithms in Python, achieving \textbf{95\%} accuracy in vehicle detection.
Deployed the system on AWS with Lambda and S3 for scalable image processing, reducing processing costs by \textbf{40\%}.
Created a mobile application in React Native for tracking personal finances, with secure data storage using Firebase Authentication and Firestore.
Integrated data visualization features to provide users with monthly spending insights, improving financial literacy for over 500 users.

subheadings.position: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
resumeItems: Graduated with honors, GPA: 3.8/4.0
Relevant coursework: Data Structures and Algorithms, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing, Distributed Systems
